summary: GENTURIX Pre-Deployment Consolidation - All 8 Critical Points PASSED. Backend: 35/35 tests passed. Frontend: All UI features verified.

1_profiles.details: Avatar in Sidebar and Topbar shows profile_photo (fallback to letter when no photo). Profile PATCH updates work correctly.

2_directory.details: All roles (Admin, Guard, HR, Resident) can access /api/profile/directory/condominium. Directory shows 8 users grouped by role.

3_navigation.details: Guard UI has all 8 tabs (Alertas, Visitas, Mi Turno, Ausencias, Registro, Historial, Personas, Perfil). HR Module has Directorio de Personas and Mi Perfil tabs. No dead-ends.

4_notifications.details: Bell icon shows real alert count from /api/security/panic-events. Shows 'No hay alertas activas' when no active alerts.

5_modules.details: School module NOT visible in sidebar (disabled). Reservaciones visible in sidebar (enabled).

6_reservations.details: Admin can create areas and manage reservations. Resident can view areas. Tabs: Ãreas, Reservar, Mis Reservaciones, Pendientes.

7_security.details: Multi-tenant isolation enforced. All users have condominium_id. Resident cannot access admin endpoints (returns 403).

8_e2e.details: Guard login -> Profile edit -> Return to Alerts flow works. Can navigate all 8 tabs without dead-ends.

seed_data_creation: Test Pool Area created in reservations module during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 8 critical points for pre-deployment consolidation have been verified. Backend APIs all working. Frontend UI components all functional. Guard UI has 8 tabs, HR Module has Personas and Mi Perfil tabs, Resident UI has Personas tab. Notifications bell shows real data. Disabled modules (school) hidden, enabled modules (reservations) visible.
